title: gluten_free
description: These products are free of gluten which can cause health problems for people with gluten related disorders including Celiac Disease, Non-celiac Gluten Sensitivity, and Gluten Ataxia

title: pescatarian
description: These products do not contain meat except they may contain fish

title: mediterranean
description: Mediterranean cuisine is the food from teh lands around the Mediterranean Sea, and it distinctly features a diet rich in olive oil, wheat products, and fish
